channel.title: Were do i add the custom iteams in class8.java
channel.description:
part 1-story- now i psted this info (Now my source and client is from this youtube video- http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MpNuUSUlkHY and im trying to add the custom items from this youtube video- http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_SK-pM-IE00 yet since my source and client did not come with any customs im sorta stuck on were to put the custom lol can u guys help my telling me were to put it or send a ) in another topic in the wrong place but then i got a link to go here----> http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,262499.0.html then went down from 100 to 18 errors but i have no clue what i did lol
part 2-what i need help with- now i just dont know where to put the custom items at lol, tryign to put the adim godsword in but u have to make a id for it, but the real problem is on the first utube vid link he had customs already there and mine did not have customs so can u guys show me where to put my customs items at for the first time so i make my 18 errors go to no errors :) thanks

item.title: Were do i add the custom iteams in class8.java
item.dc:creator: @lanxranger lanxranger
item.description:
@lanxranger wrote:

I did do that but when i put on the custom armors they go to the wepon slot and i cant hold wepons here is one of the ints

if(i == 10019) // change this if you need to “item number”
{
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wield”;//New option
class8.anIntArray156 = new int[2];
class8.anIntArray160 = new int[2];
class8.anIntArray156[0] = 43072;
class8.anIntArray160[0] = 925;
class8.anIntArray156[1] = 4550;
class8.anIntArray160[1] = 925;
class8.anInt174 = 14104; //Model ID
class8.anInt181 = 1330; //zoom increase will make it smaller
class8.anInt190 = 310; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you
class8.anInt198 = 1800; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle
class8.anInt169 = 0; // model offset increase to move to the right
class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up
class8.anInt165 = 14105;//male wearing
class8.anInt200 = 14105;//female wearing
class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves
class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves
class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable
class8.aString170 = “Dragon platebody”;//Name of the new item
class8.aByteArray178 = “Provides excellent protection”.getBytes();//examin info
}

now if u find it im pretty dum at this lol so no mean comments

Read full topic

item.title: Were do i add the custom iteams in class8.java
item.dc:creator: @CreatorAlex CreatorAlex
item.description:
@CreatorAlex wrote:

Open class8, and find this

[code] public static final Class8 method198(int i)
{
for(int j = 0; j < 10; j++)
if(aClass8Array172[j].anInt157 == i)
return aClass8Array172[j];

    anInt180 = (anInt180 + 1) % 10;
    Class8 class8 = aClass8Array172[anInt180];
    aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_183.anInt1406 = anIntArray195[i];
    class8.anInt157 = i;
    class8.method197();
    class8.method203(true, aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_183);[/code]

Now make a new line directly under that, and paste your ints. That should be all you need.
(Of course the Models)

Read full topic
